sendBettingState() - Method in class netgame.blackjack.Networking
This method is used by messageReceived() to send state messages to both players.

This method is used by messageReceived() to send state messages to both players.
sendToOthers(int, Object) - Method in class netgame.blackjack.Networking
This method is used by messageReceived() to send state messages to the rest of the players.

This method is called when the hub shuts down.
shuffle() - Method in class netgame.blackjack.Deck
Put all the used cards back into the deck (if any), and shuffle the deck into a random order.
